hooks.github: git config user.name citrus327 && git config user.email citrus327@outlook.com
hooks.npm: yarn config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ --global && npm config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org/
hooks.cnpm: yarn config set registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org --global && npm config set registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org/
